title: Bedtime Stories and Prayers (Little Blessings)
features: Bedtime routines often include a story and prayer. Now parents and kids can combine both with a special Little Blessings compilation book. The padded hardcover book includes the following sweet stories:
Bedtime Blessings, which reminds kids that God created nighttime too and they have nothing to fear
which reminds kids that God created nighttime too and they have nothing to fear
Thank You, God, which reminds kids to be thankful for everything
, which reminds kids to be thankful for everything
Blessings Everywhere, which helps readers remember their blessings
, which helps readers remember their blessings
God Loves You, which carries the most powerful message of all to comfort and guide little ones through the night and through their lives.
which carries the most powerful message of all to comfort and guide little ones through the night and through their lives.
Each page is filled with full color art of the endearing multicultural Little Blessings characters with illustrations by Care Bear creator Elena Kucharik.
description: Special Bedtime Edition Four Books in One!

Make bedtime memorable and meaningful with this special collection of four favorite Little Blessings stories. All the stories and prayers tell of God’s love and help kids learn to thank God each day. As they drift off to sleep, they will be assured of God’s protection and comforted by his love.
is the perfect way to end each day.
Excerpt. © Reprinted by permission. All rights reserved.
By Dandi Daley Mackall Kathleen Long Bostrom
Hush-hush sunset paints the sky. Night is falling.
Day is closing with a sigh. God makes nighttime too.
Time to put the toys away, Wind down from a day of play.
Almost there now— don't delay! God makes nighttime too.
Dandi Daley Mackall Kathleen Long Bostrom
